component.name: createFolder
component.description: Used to create a new empty folder.

component.name: getFolderInformation
component.description: Retrieves the full metadata about a folder, including information about when it was last updated as well as the files and folders contained in it.

component.name: updateFolderInformation
component.description: Used to update information about the folder.

component.name: copyFolder
component.description: Used to create a copy of a folder in another folder.

component.name: shareFolder
component.description: Used to create a shared link for this particular folder.
